fullDescription.intro: This node performs a principal component analysis (PCA) on the given input data. Given the number of dimensions to reduce to, the data is projected into a space of this dimension with a minimum of information loss.
fullDescription.option: Determine the number of dimensions the input data is projected to. The number of dimensions must be lower or equal than the number of input columns.
If checked, the columns containing the input data are removed in the output table.

option.name: fail if missing values are encountered

fullDescription.option: If checked, execution fails if the selected columns contain missing values. If not checked all lines containing missing values are ignored.
Select columns that are included in the analysis of principal components.

ports.outPort: Table with input values projected to their principal components
